title: History Essay
description: Write a 500-word essay on a historical event of your choice. This assignment is relatively easy and carries 15 marks.

title: Science Project
description: Create a science project presentation on a topic of your choosing. This is a challenging assignment worth 30 marks.

title: Literature Analysis
description: Analyze a piece of literature and write a critical analysis essay. This assignment is of intermediate difficulty and is worth 18 marks.

title: Programming Assignment
description: Write a program to solve a complex problem. This advanced programming assignment carries 25 marks.

title: Art Project
description: Create an art project using your preferred medium. This assignment is relatively easy and is worth 12 marks.

title: Geography Quiz
description: Take a geography quiz covering countries, capitals, and landmarks. This easy assignment carries 10 marks.

title: Chemistry Lab Report
description: Conduct a chemistry experiment and write a detailed lab report. This intermediate assignment is worth 22 marks.
